body: Multiple penises are always quite an experience.

This is completely unrelated, but I just found out about the tag "Dynamic Pants". What in God's green Earth are dynamic pants and how does it relate to porn? Apparently they're pants mostly made of polyamide material that help reduce the effects of water, wind, and sun. They're also used by sailors and people doing boat activities. Alright, cool, but that still doesn't answer my question of what they have to do with porn. Whenever I search the tag nothing shows up, just an empty page. But it says there is one upload with the tag 'Dynamic Pants' and I am so god damn interested as to what it contains.
Lol no.....should check tags before reading
